column4: Alright, "my brother" being the genious he is, decided to get rid of my Ubuntu partition on my laptop using Partition Magic. GRUB now fails to load and because of "my brother" I can't boot into XP. Any ideas on what to do?
I'll do that for sure, any other ideas?
sorry, not really. You might be able to salvage the install from a LiveCD, but that's not an area I know anything about
